title: Auckland Central - Studio Apartment - Furnished
description: Auckland City Centre Ready to move in now, Walking distance to Auckland Hospital. Look no further at this rent, you would pay more on today’s market. Rent $310 per week (includes cold water) Power additional These apartments do not last on the rental market. Situated across from AUT & Auckland University. Studio style furnished apartment with double bed. Kitchen has bar fridge, dishwasher, microwave, oven and hob. Dining table with 2 chairs and a small flat screen TV Washing machine /dryer combined Minutes from Queen Street, buses , English schools, Auckland Hospital, Sky City, and many more training schools. In the heart of Auckland where so much is available. Move in Cost: 4 weeks Bond $1240, 1 week’s rent $310
